summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2987, for the improvement of Mills Street, from California Avenue to Fauntleroy Avenue; all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, constructing temporary wood walks and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 35944 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
